languages.text: "Смерть давно нашептывает о кончине Вил'Маражая. Его жизнь в твоих руках, а смерть — в моих. Отдай приказ, и нить его судьбы оборвется сегодня же после отбоя".
"Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."
languages.original_text: "Смерть давно нашептывает о кончине Вил'Маражая. Его жизнь в твоих руках, а смерть — в моих. Отдай приказ, и нить его судьбы оборвется сегодня же после отбоя".

traits.locale_text: "Death has long since whispered of Tei'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and his thread will be cut short before your next awakening."
"Death has long since whispered of Tei'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and his thread will be cut short before your next awakening."
"Long has death has whispered of Tei'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before next light."

"Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."
"Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."

languages.text: «Hace mucho tiempo que la muerte susurra el fin de Vil'Marazhai. Su vida está en sus manos, y su muerte en las mías. Dé la orden, y antes de la próxima jornada se habrá cortado el hilo de su destino».
languages.original_text: "Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."

traits.locale_text: «Hace mucho tiempo que la muerte susurra el fin de Vil'Marazhai. Su vida está en sus manos, y su muerte en las mías. Dé la orden, y antes de la próxima jornada se habrá cortado el hilo de su destino».

languages.text: 「マラズハイの死は、長い間囁かれてきた。彼の命はあなたの手の中に、その死は私の手の中に。命令一つで、次のウォッチまでに彼の命の糸は断ち切られるわ」
languages.original_text: "Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイの死は、長い間囁かれてきた。彼の命はあなたの手の中に、その死は私の手の中に。命令一つで、次のウォッチまでに彼の命の糸は断ち切られるわ」

languages.text: “死亡早已呼唤着敌者玛拉斋的名字。你掌握着他的性命，而我掌握着他的死亡。只要你一声令下，我就会在下一巡开始之前，了结他的性命。”
languages.original_text: "Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."

traits.locale_text: “死亡早已呼唤着敌者玛拉斋的名字。你掌握着他的性命，而我掌握着他的死亡。只要你一声令下，我就会在下一巡开始之前，了结他的性命。”

languages.text: "Schon lange flüstert der Tod von Vil'Marazhais Niedergang. Sein Leben ist in Eurer Hand, sein Tod in meiner. Erteilt den Befehl, und der Faden seines Lebens wird noch vor der nächsten Wache durchtrennt sein."
languages.original_text: "Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."

traits.locale_text: "Schon lange flüstert der Tod von Vil'Marazhais Niedergang. Sein Leben ist in Eurer Hand, sein Tod in meiner. Erteilt den Befehl, und der Faden seines Lebens wird noch vor der nächsten Wache durchtrennt sein."

languages.text: « La mort murmure depuis longtemps la chute inéluctable de Vil'Marazhai. Sa vie est entre vos mains, et son exécution entre les miennes. Un mot de votre part, et le fil de sa vie sera tranché avant le prochain quart. »
languages.original_text: "Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."

traits.locale_text: « La mort murmure depuis longtemps la chute inéluctable de Vil'Marazhai. Sa vie est entre vos mains, et son exécution entre les miennes. Un mot de votre part, et le fil de sa vie sera tranché avant le prochain quart. »

languages.original_text: "Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."

languages.text: "Ölüm, nicedir Vil'Marazhai'ın sonunun gelmesini fısıldamıştır. Yaşamı senin ellerinde, ölümüyse benim. Emri vermen yeter: Önümüzdeki vardiyaya geçilmeden yaşam ipliği kesilir."
languages.original_text: "Long has death whispered of Vil'Marazhai's demise. His life is in your hands, his death is in mine. Give the order, and the thread of his life will be cut short before the next watch."
